overview:
Nick Bertolino is a co-founder and co-owner of PipelineDeals. Nick has over 18 years of professional work experience in sales, software development, systems integration and management consulting.

Nick has worked in the past for Deloitte Consulting, Cambridge Technology Partners, GE, and several startup technology organizations. He was responsible for software implementation as well as direct selling of software consulting services. Nick was also senior manager in Deloitteâ€™s CRM consulting practice.

Most recently, he was employed by GSI Commerce, the market leader in ecommerce outsourcing for large organizations. Nick was responsible for sales operations as well as managing several large luxury brand accounts.

Nick is responsible for PipelineDeal’s product development, technology, customer service and operations.

Nick has a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science from Drexel University and a Masters in Business Administration from Carnegie Mellon University.
